title: Ex-Officer Will Stand Trial in Fatal Shooting of Black Man in Michigan
description: A judge said there was probable cause for Christopher Schurr to be tried for second-degree murder in the killing of Patrick Lyoya, an unarmed Black man, during a traffic stop in April.
dc:creator: Christine Chung
media:credit: Joel Bissell/The Grand Rapids Press, via Associated Press
media:description: Christopher Schurr, a former Grand Rapids, Mich., police officer, will be tried for second-degree murder in the killing of Patrick Lyoya on April 4.
